Section1.title: How Tennis Nallbani was born
Section1.p1: Tennis Nallbani was founded in 2014 by a highly experienced tennis coach with a deep-rooted passion for the sport. Co-founder Toni Nallbani comes from a family with a strong tennis legacy.
Section1.p2: His uncle, Sali Nallbani, was the first Albanian tennis champion, holding 26 international titles along with numerous national championships. His family played a crucial role in popularizing tennis in Albania from 1930 to 1964, a tradition later continued by his uncle, Fatos Nallbani.

Section2.title: Milestones and Growth
Section2.p17: Toni achieved his first major successes as a coach when his students won several junior and adult tournaments
Section2.p22: He shifted his focus exclusively to children's tennis by coaching at the American School of Tirana (TIS), aiming to cultivate young talent
Section2.p24: Tennis Nallbani makes a strong comeback, resuming training for all age groups at Petro Nini Luarasi School, thanks to the support of passionate tennis enthusiasts
Section2.p25: With fresh ideas and a clear vision, Tennis Nallbani is set to further expand and popularize the sport in Tirana and Albania. The passion for tennis continues to grow, inspiring future generations

Section3.title: Coach Toni
Section3.p1: Toni grew up and developed his skills as a player at Tirana Club, where he became a multi-time Albanian champion in the U14-U16 categories and a finalist in several competitions. In 2014, he seized the opportunity to work as a professional coach at Tirana Club, initially training close friends and later expanding his activities over the years.
Section3.p2: While pursuing his career as a part-time tennis coach, Toni also completed his university studies in Architecture. After graduation, he worked as an architect for several years, continuing to coach tennis on the side. His passion for the sport never faded, and he constantly gained experience from fellow players and coaches.
Section3.p3: In 2014, he earned his ITF coaching license and also worked as an international referee for Tennis Europe events in Tirana. Through these years, Toni faced a pivotal life decision and realized that tennis was his true calling. His mission became clear: to promote the sport and develop new generations of junior and adult players in Tirana and across Albania.

Section1.title: A variety of services
Section1.p1: At Nallbani Tennis, we believe in providing a comprehensive experience for our members. Our services are designed to cater to players of all levels, from beginners to advanced. Our coaching programs are designed to be fun and engaging, ensuring that you not only improve your skills but also enjoy the process.
Section1.p2: In addition to coaching, we offer a range of membership options to suit your needs. We also organize regular events and tournaments, giving you the opportunity to showcase your skills and compete with other players. These events are a great way to meet new people, make friends, and enjoy the social aspect of the game.
Section1.p3: At Nallbani Tennis, we are committed to creating a welcoming and inclusive community for all players. We believe that tennis is not just a sport, but a way to connect with others and build lasting relationships.

Section2.p1: One-on-one coaching designed specifically for you. Each session is tailored to your level, goals, and playing style, with full attention on improving your technique, movement, and confidence on court.
Section2.p2: Small group sessions led personally by the coach, combining structured training with a motivating atmosphere. Ideal for improving match play, consistency, and learning through shared experience.
Section2.p3: Simple and flexible membership plans that give you ongoing access to coaching and training programs. Designed for players who want steady progress with a personal approach.
Section2.p4: Book your court time easily and train without hassle. Reservations are managed directly to ensure availability and a smooth training experience.

Section3.title: Become a member today!
Section3.p1: We want to adjust our services to your needs. Please follow the steps below to get in touch with us and discuss your needs.
Section3.form1: Fill in the form with your details.
Section3.form2: You'll receive all the details in a whatsapp message instantly.
Section3.form3: Discuss your needs and finalize the details.
Section3.form4: If you wish to proceed, we will create an account for you.
Section3.contactTitle: These info will be used to create your account and send you updates about your membership.
